name: Iron Conflict
description:
Fight Epic Battles On the Ground and In the AirFrom tanks to planes, each vehicle has distinct controls and playstyle. Command from a “birds-eye” perspective or micromanage your units – the choice is yours!!
Immersive Tactical GameplayChoose from three different unit types to form a squad. Play your way or complement your teammates’ tactics to secure victory.
No Battle Is the SameJoin 3v3 and 5v5 matches, or dive into 10v10 online matches where 60 total units fight on randomly generated, massive battlefields!
United We Stand, Divided We FallTeamwork makes all the difference in Iron Conflict! Keep communication channels open, coordinate with your team at every step, or all will be lost ...
